thread.title: Rain pushes Chase race at Charlotte to Sunday afternoon

title: Rain pushes Chase race at Charlotte to Sunday afternoon
text:

(AP) - The opening race of the second round of NASCAR's playoffs was washed out by persistent rain Saturday at Charlotte Motor Speedway Post to Facebook Rain pushes Chase race at Charlotte to Sunday afternoon CONCORD, N.C. (AP) - The opening race of the second round of NASCAR's playoffs was washed out by persistent rain Saturday at Charlotte Motor Speedway  //www.king5.com/story/sports/2015/10/10/rain-pushes-chase-race-at-charlotte-to-sunday-afternoon/73759616/   Join the Conversation To   Rain pushes Chase race at Charlotte to Sunday afternoon Associated Press 7:21 p.m. PDT October 10, 2015 Oct 10, 2015; Concord, NC, USA; NASCAR fans watch cars go through inspection in the rain before during the Bank of America 500 at Charlotte Motor Speedway. Mandatory Credit: Peter Casey-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Peter Casey-USA TODAY Sports) 2 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
CONCORD, N.C. (AP) - The opening race of the second round of NASCAR's playoffs was washed out by persistent rain Saturday at Charlotte Motor Speedway. 
The race was rescheduled for Sunday afternoon. It's just NASCAR's second rainout of the season, although several events this year were delayed because of weather. 
Joe Gibbs Racing headed into the event trying to reclaim some of the momentum seized by reigning Sprint Cup champion Kevin Harvick, who won last week at Dover to keep his title defense intact. JGR drivers Denny Hamlin and Matt Kenseth won the first two races in the opening round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup championships. 
But the stakes are higher in round two, which includes races at Charlotte, Kansas and finally Talladega. The field has been trimmed to 12 drivers, and JGR qualified all four of its cars in the top eight at Charlotte. 
Kenseth and Kyle Busch will start on the front row, while Harvick will start 11th. Harvick is the defending race winner, and used his Charlotte victory last year to coast into the third round of the playoffs. 
A victory in a Chase race earns a driver an automatic berth into the next round. 2 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://www.king5.com/story/sports/2015/10/10/rain-pushes-chase-race-at-charlotte-to-sunday-afternoon/73759616/ TOP VIDEOS
